summary: Gives pine trees a more natural look
descriptionHtml:
[heading][size=14][color=green]Realistic Pine Trees[/color][/heading][/size]
Improves the pine tree meshes and adds real 3d branches. The result is a more natural look.
The trees do have more polygones now, so fps will likely descrease on you system.

[size=12][color=red]Compatibility:[/color][/size]
This mod is compatible with all other mods that do not change the pine tree meshes.
[b]Attention;[/b] the UV fixed version is based on default vanilla textures or Vurts SFO textures. Using any other color changed bark texture might result in strange looking branches, since the textures do not match anymore.

The meshes itself do not cause any CTD.  If you face any, thats might be caused by an older grafic card (not enoughe grafic ram) or simply to many grafic mods installed (hig res textures, mesh improvements etc.) With 2 or 3gig of grafic ram you\'ll be on the save side :P

[b]Has been tested with 1 gig and still working fine with ENB and maximum settings + .ini tweaks to improve grafic. (Vanilla default textures and grids on default 5).[/b]

[size=12][color=red]Installation:[/color][/size]
Choose either [b]\'Vanilla\'[/b] folder for plain skyrim or [b]\'SFO\'[/b] folder if you use Vurts Flora Overhaul. 
Copy paste the folders content in the Skyrim/Data folder. There is nothing else to do, no .esp involved at all.

[size=12][color=red]Uninstallation:[/color][/size]
go to [b]Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\landscape\\trees[/b] and delete the following files:

treepineforest01.nif
treepineforest02.nif
treepineforestdead02.nif
treepineforestdead04.nif
treepineforestdeadsnow04.nif

[size=8]Changelog:[/size]

Version 1.2 - Every tree comes now with slightly different branches. Some have more, some less.
Version 1.1a  - Black texture bug from PineTree04 fixed. Textures from the SFO edition are linked correctly now. Files are separated in the download section.
Version 1.1  - All branches are thinner and facing down like they should. The branches for the dead pines have been much improved.
Version 1.0a - Fixed UV\'s and additional textures added
Version 1.0  - Initial release, adds branches to pine trees
author: 3AMt
